Header: Thailand cave rescue: Diver dies while taking in supplies
Content: A former Thai navy diver has died while taking part in efforts to rescue 12 boys and their football coach trapped in a flooded cave in Thailand. Petty Officer Saman Gunan lost consciousness on his way out of the Tham Luang cave complex, where had been delivering air tanks. He was brought out by his dive partner but could not be revived. PO Saman Gunan, who is thought to have been 38, had left the navy but returned to help the rescue operation. Officials said his funeral will be sponsored by the Thai king.
